message: So. What did everyone think?  Especially those that hadn't read the book. :)
I wish this group was busier. I want to drink all the non-readers' delicious delicious tears.
and maybe make them read the books
I think between that and the last episode, it'll hook them good
Either way, dance with dragons is coming out next month. :-D
Yep. I think all the people pissed at last nights episode will be pleasantly surprised at next weeks.
I don't know, I'm expecting the finale to lose more viewers than this episode did. The final scene might not sit well with some people.
I just watched the episode and it was great. The final scene was pretty intense. Having not read the books, I can't wait for the next episode.

This episode alone has made me want to power through the first book more than ever. I was previously about half way through the first novel, and have since spent every waking moment I could working to finish it before the upcoming 10th episode.
